title: Bulletproof Monk
description: Bulletproof Monk is a Hong Kong action movie on paper. It is the story of a quest for enlightenment along a road fraught with challenge and conflict, from vicious street gangs to affairs of the heart. This collection features an introduction by legendary Hong Kong action film director John Woo, who will be directing the big-screen adaptation of Bulletproof Monk next year
author: Brett Lewis
